name: odds are shawl
sizes_available: approx 44" long x 29" wide at max measurements
notes:
the odds are shawl is a soft, luxurious, one-skein crochet pattern! worked in rows with a mixture of textured stitches, it's a joy to stitch and the perfect gentle start to the year. this pattern is was shared on moogly as a free crochet along over the month of january 2025, and all the parts are now available.

thereis a video tutorial for each section, shared in both right and left-handed versions. 

to make this crochet shawl, i used caron colorama halo perfect phasing yarn - just one skein! so this is a wonderful project with which to give it a try. this pattern shows off the beauty of this yarn's truly perfect gradient or ombre. and when you're all finished, there are just 2 ends to weave in!

this pattern is free on the blog, or available for purchase here as an ad-free pdf!
